bibl.title: Probaskania: Amulets and Magic in Antiquity.

Dietrich Boschung & Jan N. Bremmer (edd.), The Materiality of Magic = Morphomata. 20 (Paderborn, 2015) pp. 177-204, 6 figg. et pll. 7-11 coul.

1. Introduction. - 2. Naming and depicting the Evil Eye. - 3. Naming amulets. - 4. Growing healthy. - 5. Averting and curing diseases. - 6. Rites of passage. - 7. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
